name: Codeminer 42
tag_list: ruby-on-rails, ruby, rails, consulting, software-development, brazil, agile
description: Software Boutique for Ruby based Startup
overview:
Codeminer 42 was co-founded by Daniel Pisano, Rodrigo Abilheira and Fabio Akita. Akita being one of the leading Ruby evangelists in Brazil, responsible for organising Rubyconf Brazil for the last 5 years, ensures that Codeminer 42 is a Ruby driven environment encompassing all the best practices and technologies that has made the Ruby ecosystem so well known for excellence, specially in the Web Startups arena.

In it’s first year Codeminer 42 has grown to almost 50 employees. The head-quarter is in São Paulo, one of the largest megalopolis in the World. But quickly it has set foot in the cities of Porto Alegre (in the South of Brazil), Fortaleza and Natal (in the Northeast). The goal being to find the best software developers in the country.

Codeminer 42 has delivered several web products for its clients, almost all of them Brazilian founded startups and is now looking for new markets around the globe.
